E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/6/1990
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
C Joe Solano, 3B Alfonso Vaca
in return for
SS Johnny Keggs.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1990
Subject: I will retire
Hey Boss,
I will hang up the cleats after this season.
It was a great time, but my family needs me now.

Regards,
Louis Miller
